casebody.data:
NEW JERSEY DIVISION OF CHILD PROTECTION AND PERMANENCY, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
L.M.W., Defendant-Petitioner,
and
J.R., (deceased), Defendant. In the Matter of the Guardianship of J.R., a Minor-Respondent. C-1 September Term 2018
080364 Supreme Court of New Jersey. September 12, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of B.K. for reconsideration of the Court's order denying the petition for certification is denied.
